text: Hi Josh! Nice to meet you. Happy New Year! As Emma mentioned, is there anything you'd like to share about yourself, and what would you like to get out of this mentorship?

Hi Tessa, nice to meet you too and I hope you've had a great festive season.
So a bit about me, I'm currently a 3rd year student studying 3D Animation at the University of Hertfordshire, my main interest is 3D Animation although I also enjoy Lighting and Drawing.
I would be very grateful if you were able to answer any questions I have about the industry (I'm sorry if some are dumb). Also if you could give me some feedback on any shots that I am working on that would be awesome :slightly_smiling_face:
